  persistent: {
    cluster: {
      remote: {
        clusterB: {
          mode: "proxy",
          skip_unavailable: "true",
          server_name: "clusterb.es.region-b.gcp.elastic-cloud.com",
          proxy_socket_connections: "18",
          proxy_address: "clusterb.es.region-b.gcp.elastic-cloud.com:9400",

      },
    },
  },
});
